Direct Known Subclasses:
TreeToolControllerAJAX
public class TreeToolController
extends org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.AbstractCommandController

The TreeToolController is responsible for rendering the harvest web site as a tree structure.

Author:
bbeaumont
